title: dApp Connector - ErgoDocs
summary: Fleet lets you easily create Ergo transactions with a pure JS library. There is also NightOwl dApp Connector React package and accompanying video tutorial.

sections.heading: dApp Connector#
sections.content: Fleet lets you easily create Ergo transactions with a pure JS library. There is also NightOwl dApp Connector React package and accompanying video tutorial.
